outputs.name: exterior_set
outputs.description:
A list of exterior modifiers that can be used to edit
or create a ModifierSet object.

inputs.name: _exterior_wall_
inputs.description:
A modifier object for exterior walls (or text for
the identifier of the modifier within the library).

inputs.name: _exterior_roof_
inputs.description:
A modifier object for exterior roofs (or text for
the identifier of the modifier within the library).

inputs.name: _exposed_floor_
inputs.description:
A modifier object for exposed floors (or text for
the identifier of the modifier within the library).

name: HB Exterior Modifier Subset
description:
Create a list of exterior modifiers that can be used to edit or create a
